qas.question: What hardware device was merged with the video marketplace?
Where and when was the Zune HD marketplace announced?
The Zune video marketplace was merged with what Live feature?
What was the new name of this Live video store?
How many countries were slated for the Zune Marketplace launch?
How many countries was E3 held in?

plausible_answers.text: Zune Video Marketplace and the Xbox Live Video Store

qas.question: The Xbox Live Video Store is the merger of what two marketplaces?
Merging the Zune and Xbox Live stores affected the release of what product?
When was the Zune HD set to be decommissioned?

context: On <b6_0>May<b6_0/> 26, 2009, Microsoft announced the future release of <a0_0>the <b8_0>Zune<a0_0/> HD<b8_0/> (in <b9_0>the fall of 2009<b9_0/>), the next addition to the Zune product range. This is of an impact on the Xbox Live Video Store as it was also announced that the <b7_0>Zune Video Marketplace and the <a2_0>Xbox Live Video Store<b7_0/><a2_0/> will be merged to form the <a3_0>Zune Marketplace<a3_0/>, which will be arriving on Xbox Live in <a4_0><b5_0>7<b5_0/><a4_0/> countries initially, the United Kingdom, the United States, France, Italy, Germany, Ireland and Spain. Further details were released at the Microsoft press conference at <a1_0>E3 2009<a1_0/>.
